description:
Kamiyama declines an invitation for a meal, and Hayashida calls him out on having changed. Though the Cromartie boys aren`t smart, Kamiyama does his best to explain human psychology.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment Kamiyama tenta de prouver qu`il n`avait pas chang√©
